alert.note: Alert for Las Vegas Valley; Southern Clark County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 04 at 2:30AM PST until February 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Clark and Southern Nye County, Las Vegas Valley and Southern Clark County. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In the Las Vegas Valley, the strongest of these winds are expected to occur west of Rainbow Boulevard.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Las Vegas Valley; Southern Clark County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
